body: it's something like this.the elder sister works alone in some other town, she made a phone call home for no reason, said nothing except some hellos. The younger brother suspected that this was a goodbye call before suicide, and rushed to the sister's place over night. judging from the room, the sister was actually about to kill herself with gas. the brother stayed and tried to nurse the sister back to normal, but soon found out the sister was trying to give him her bank book and virginity as a parting gift. their parents showed up, laid down some encouragement and left, didn't help the situation. the sister seduced the brother for the 2nd time and they did it. the next morning, the brother found the sister forgotten all that's happened and was about to go to work.

i won't ask for traslation but if someone that undestand japanes can tell us what he understand of this please share cause, i and many want to know if this is a prequel to She Used to Be Cool (379044 and 379046), or not, some say this is actually the prototype to She Used to Be Cool (different age for prota, seem different parent etc...) so if someone could help, i would be grateful.

This one is most likely UNRELATED to that other mukashi story. The boy's name here is Yuuya while the other's is Yuuta and their parents' appearances are different. Basically just another story with similar theme to the author's other mukashi's.
Looking forward to 2nd chapter though, from his twitter posts, the siblings seem to be having fun with their new life and the girl looks more cheerful.

SOMEONE EXPLAINS TO ME WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON HERE, I don't think this is part 1, because in the other two parts clearly the boy and his sister have their first sexual relationship each, even the boy asks her if it hurt last night, but here it doesn't seem to be a continuation either because the author puts on a visual effect of blood when the boy penetrates his sister, it doesn't make sense! after all this is part 1 that is followed by the other two? or part 3? in both possibilities it seemed to have a big continuity error. what would this be here then? a sequel? prequel? alternate universe? prototype? does not make sense!

I really hope this isn’t part 3 but the fact that he was able to ride a whole-ass plane by himself makes me think he’s older and it’s a part 3. Which means they completely went back on all the “let’s be together & get married” stuff from last chapter which led to her almost doing the unthinkable. She’s an adult and looks like she got a job. He should have her rent an apartment nearby his school and plot armor somehow find a job opening for the exact same job she already has just closer to him.

If I'm getting everything in the right way, this is a prequel to #349044 and #379046 which is about why did she change, how she was like before, and what type of relationship the bro/sis had.
Sadly it's not translated so we either have to wait for someone to translate it with the goodness in there heart or someone paying translators to do it. If i remember correctly it's about 10 cent a page or something like that, it doesn't cost a lot and you can find some of them in the end of a manga they translated, so anyone wanna do something for the sake of the story?
Is this the same 2 from the "i used to be cool one?"
If you know Japanese, you will find the story rather gloomy. Not as dark as Metamorphosis/Emergence, but it is already enough to make you not want to fap.

Nakani is now a pioneer in the extremely blursed genre of "older sister with mental issues having bizarre and wholesome sex with thoughtful horny younger brother".

A quick throw in to understand a bit of the story: the girl calls her family and talks to the mother and brother. Afterwards, the mother consults the son, whether he thinks she sounded weird or not and the son answers no and that they talked about a trip to hokkaido long time ago and how fun it was (which is probably the reference to the title). The mother decides to visit her tomorrow and leaves the room. Worried by his mothers' reaction, Yuuya (the boy) starts to think and realizes that his sister might have tried to convey something by mentioning the trip and that it might have been a goodbye call. Thinking that, he immediately makes his to his sister (incredible good scene btw. I love it). He arrives at his sister's apartment worried that she didn't pick up his calls, when she suddenly calls him back and apologized that she was sleeping. When his sister opens the door, he is shocked by how she looks (her eyes). He quickly regains himself and walks in as if nothing happened.
Can we get a ENG version? <3
